decisions.cost_analysis: Reroute cost: ₹525 (35×₹15). Revenue saved: ₹2,821.55 (35×₹80.62 avg margin). Net: +₹2,296.55
decisions.reasoning: CFO perspective: Calculates ₹2,296.55 net benefit. CTO perspective: 92.1% failure rate affecting VIP customers for 2 hours violates our 99.5% SLA commitment. Pattern stability indicates systemic HDFC issue, making reroute to Razorpay likely to succeed. Moderator synthesis: Unanimous decision—both financial profitability and operational reliability perspectives strongly align.
